version_description:
Improved:
• New app icon!
• Synchronization speed with Mantano Cloud
• Various optimizations

Fixed:
• Download of covers from Mantano Cloud
• Last access date on synchronized books

Improved:
• New app icon!
• Synchronization speed with Mantano Cloud
• Various optimizations

Fixed:
• Download of covers from Mantano Cloud
• Last access date on synchronized books

Mantano Reader is now Bookari!

New:
• Backup and synchronization are now available for FREE (with usage quotas)!
• You can now use your Google or Facebook account to sign in to the Cloud
• Capture web pages for offline reading using our companion extension for Google Chrome (paid Cloud accounts only)

Sync improvements:
• Automatic synchronization of your books when closing or opening the app
• Fixed highlights synchronization with Android

Reader:
• Global book progression and local storage for EPUB 3
• Show current chapter and jump to previous and next ones
• Add a magnifying glass for EPUB 2 and PDF selection
• Fixed a few bugs with EPUB

Library:
• Auto-completion of tags and authors
• Search through your Calibre's OPDS catalog

Mantano Reader is now Bookari!

New:
• Backup and synchronization are now available for FREE (with usage quotas)!
• You can now use your Google or Facebook account to sign in to the Cloud
• Capture web pages for offline reading using our companion extension for Google Chrome (paid Cloud accounts only)

Sync improvements:
• Automatic synchronization of your books when closing or opening the app
• Fixed highlights synchronization with Android

Reader:
• Global book progression and local storage for EPUB 3
• Show current chapter and jump to previous and next ones
• Add a magnifying glass for EPUB 2 and PDF selection
• Fixed a few bugs with EPUB

Library:
• Auto-completion of tags and authors
• Search through your Calibre's OPDS catalog

Listen to your books:
• Added support for EPUB 3 audio books (with media overlays)
• Text-to-speech is now available for EPUB 3 books (reflowable only)
• Listen with the screen locked, or using other apps
• Control playback with your headphones
• Jump from sentence to sentence or to next page
• Tap on a sentence to speak it
• Change volume, pitch and speed of the TTS voice

PDF improved:
• Current page zoom is kept from page to page
• In landscape, the page automatically fits the screen and scroll vertically

Listen to your books:
• Added support for EPUB 3 audio books (with media overlays)
• Text-to-speech is now available for EPUB 3 books (reflowable only)
• Listen with the screen locked, or using other apps
• Control playback with your headphones
• Jump from sentence to sentence or to next page
• Tap on a sentence to speak it
• Change volume, pitch and speed of the TTS voice

PDF improved:
• Current page zoom is kept from page to page
• In landscape, the page automatically fits the screen and scroll vertically

Added:
• Page turn animation for EPUB 3 books

Improved:
• Speed of Cloud synchronization
• Organize your book series by adding volume numbers
• Overall stability

Fixed:
• OPDS catalogs
• Crash when opening EPUB 3 books protected with Adobe DRM
• Frozen EPUB 3 books when locking the device

Added:
• Page turn animation for EPUB 3 books

Improved:
• Speed of Cloud synchronization
• Organize your book series by adding volume numbers
• Overall stability

Fixed:
• OPDS catalogs
• Crash when opening EPUB 3 books protected with Adobe DRM
• Frozen EPUB 3 books when locking the device

Fixed:
• EPUB 3 books on iOS 10
• Bookari Cloud connectivity issues

Fixed:
• EPUB 3 books on iOS 10
• Bookari Cloud connectivity issues

Fixed:
• Random crashes

Fixed:
• Random crashes

Brand new look and feel:
• Write your notes with our beautiful new fullscreen editor
• Zoom into your favorite covers with our new book details view
• Books are grouped by authors or series when using sorting
• Arranging books and notes into collections is easier than ever
• Collections are now displayed in the detailed bookshelf view

Added:
• Sign in with multiple Adobe DRM accounts from different vendors
• Download and read books from your URMS protected stores

Improved:
• OPDS browser: galleries of related items are now displayed in each book details view
• Disable idle lock screen when reading books

Fixed:
• Sorting by book series now properly orders the volumes
• Google Drive importation
• Miscellaneous bug fixes

Brand new look and feel:
• Write your notes with our beautiful new fullscreen editor
• Zoom into your favorite covers with our new book details view
• Books are grouped by authors or series when using sorting
• Arranging books and notes into collections is easier than ever
• Collections are now displayed in the detailed bookshelf view

Added:
• Sign in with multiple Adobe DRM accounts from different vendors
• Download and read books from your URMS protected stores

Improved:
• OPDS browser: galleries of related items are now displayed in each book details view
• Disable idle lock screen when reading books

Fixed:
• Sorting by book series now properly orders the volumes
• Google Drive importation
• Miscellaneous bug fixes

Fixed:
- Crash when migrating books on application launch
- Font size preferences

Fixed:
- Crash when migrating books on application launch
- Font size preferences

Added:
- Enjoy reading by night with our new dark theme throughout the app.
- Download books directly from your web catalogs in the Stores tab.

Added:
- Enjoy reading by night with our new dark theme throughout the app.
- Download books directly from your web catalogs in the Stores tab.

Added:
- Browse your recently read or added books from the new Home screen
- A new streamlined navigation panel to switch to the stores, bookshelf, settings and more
- You can now customize the night mode's book colors for EPUB books by editing the Night theme

Added:
- Browse your recently read or added books from the new Home screen
- A new streamlined navigation panel to switch to the stores, bookshelf, settings and more
- You can now customize the night mode's book colors for EPUB books by editing the Night theme

Improved:
- Stability and speed of Cloud synchronization, especially for big libraries

Fixed:
- Progression feedback of Cloud downloads
- Crash when opening the table of contents on iOS 8
- Crash when signing in to Bookari Cloud with Google on iOS 8

- Stability and speed of Cloud synchronization, especially for big libraries

- Progression feedback of Cloud downloads
- Crash when opening the table of contents on iOS 8

Added:
- Switch between the EPUB 2 and 3 readers without losing any highlights or bookmarks
- New highlight styles for the EPUB 3 reader: strikethrough and sidemarks

Added:
- Switch between the EPUB 2 and 3 readers without losing any highlights or bookmarks
- New highlight styles for the EPUB 3 reader: strikethrough and sidemarks

Fixed:
- Crash when opening the application under specific conditions
- Crash when reading EPUB 2 or PDF books
- Support of accentuated filenames on APFS (iOS 10.3+)

Fixed:
- Crash when opening the application under specific conditions
- Crash when reading EPUB 2 or PDF books
- Support of accentuated filenames on APFS (iOS 10.3+)

Improved:

Fixed:

- Support topics with a help contact form
